all-packs-page.title: Mentor-Cards כל ערכות הקלפים
all-packs-page.sub-header: When words run out, the cards come in
all-packs-page.sub-header-2: Find the card set that suits you
all-packs-page.search-placeholder: Search by meeting topic, creator of the kit, purpose of the activity and more...

introduction-full.line1: We at Mentor-Cards believe that the processes of introspection, growth, and development should take place in the best possible way
introduction-full.line2: with minimal dependence on the environment and changing reality.
introduction-full.line3: 2020 will be remembered as a year that changed world orders in so many ways.
introduction-full.line4: We experienced what it is to turn inward, and we acted as we knew in the unknown conditions that were created in our environment.
introduction-full.line5: We trained ourselves for the new world. We continued to train and treat, and this time in front of the screens.
introduction-full.line6: From this place, at this time, and with the joint thinking of senior coaches in the country and card experts - we established Mentor-Cards.
introduction-full.line7: Mentor-Cards is a friendly platform for working with cards in digital and frontal meetings
introduction-full.line8: with an emphasis on the best user experience.
introduction-full.line9: Cards are among the most powerful tools in the worlds of coaching and therapy.
introduction-full.line10: Cards shuffle, bypass the subconscious, open and develop.
introduction-full.line11: Cards help us as professional process leaders to sharpen and specify the most suitable way for our client.
introduction-full.line12: The world is changing and developing and we have chosen to grow with it.
introduction-full.line13: We are glad that you chose to grow with us.

bio-content-1.line4: Software Engineer M.Sc and EMBA in Business Administration.
bio-content-1.line5: Family man, entrepreneur, optimist, and high-performance coach.

bio-content-2.line4: Coach and developer of people and organizations.
bio-content-2.line5: MBA in Business Administration, group facilitator, and supervisor for coaches.
bio-content-2.line6: Versatile, brave, loyal to the good, breathes deeply.

bio-content-3.line4: Software and Information Systems Engineer B.Sc
bio-content-3.line5: Cooking enthusiast, photography, technology, and nature lover
